details.text: These Blood Plasmas can be sold for a very good price (ie: 4 full Bags of Monster parts QL70~ = 1M), or they can be used in the making of #L "Emergency Treatment Laboratory" "/tell <myname> recipe 18". The requirements in Pharma Tech are very low, thus making it very profitable. It's recommended that the Bio-Communitor should be of a superior or equal QL of the Monster Parts, not to lose any QL in the process.
